item.title: Database-Builder Signal Test (Real World)
item.description:
Summary: Offered database help casually; immediate specific pain point emerged. Validated that the ‘Database Builder’ signal matches real-world demand.

Source: Raw Transcripts: Batch 3

What Happened

Offered database help to a colleague in a casual setting. Immediate specific pain point emerged â€” an Excel problem requiring a database solution.

Validation

The “Database Builder” market signal matches real-world demand. The identity is not just branding; it solves actual problems.
